paper.title: A new subsumption method in the connection graph proof procedure

paper.abstract: Compared to most of the other resolution-based proof procedures, the connection graph proof procedure (CGPP) is superior due to its effective search space reduction rules. A test for subsumption in CGPP is sufficiently efficient in comparison with the standard test. But the subsumption with no restriction may cause logical inconsistency. The restriction on subsumption to maintain the consistency has been an open problem since it was first noticed in 1981.
